title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, October 2, 2019
description: Today we feature the poem “The Emperor of Ice-Cream” by Wallace Stevens, who was born on this day in Reading, Pennsylvania, 1879.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we feature the poem “The Emperor of Ice-Cream” by Wallace Stevens, who was born on this day in Reading, Pennsylvania, 1879.
